entities.name: the advanced guard
entities.description: A group of people who are guarding something or someone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a boy who is being taken away by others.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: A teacher and friend of Harry's, who has come to take him away.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: An unknown person with a unfamiliar voice, who is also present at the scene.

relationships.description: Professor Lupin has come to take Harry away.
Professor Lupin is accompanied by the Advanced Guard when he comes to take Harry away.
